dict.string: Camera access is needed to take photos.
Access to photos is needed to upload or share images.
Microphone access is needed for recording audio.
We use contacts to help you connect with others.
Location access is needed to personalize your experience.
Motion data helps us improve your experience.
Face ID is used to securely authenticate your identity.
We use tracking to personalize content and ads.
This app needs calendar access to sync events.
This app uses notifications to keep you informed.
This app uses Bluetooth for nearby interactions.
